name: zell-wasm-modules
description: WebAssembly modules for offline file processing in ZELL

scripts.build:all: npm run build:image && npm run build:audio && npm run build:video && npm run build:pdf
scripts.build:image: emcc src/image-processor.c -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_process_image", "_compress_image", "_resize_image"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -o dist/image-processor.js
scripts.build:audio: emcc src/audio-processor.c -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_process_audio", "_compress_audio", "_merge_audio"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -o dist/audio-processor.js
scripts.build:video: emcc src/video-processor.c -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_process_video", "_compress_video", "_merge_video"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -o dist/video-processor.js
scripts.build:pdf: emcc src/pdf-processor.c -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_process_pdf", "_merge_pdfs", "_extract_text"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -o dist/pdf-processor.js
